name: The Escapist - Minimal and larger video
description:
Removes clutter from the video page of the site, and blows up the video to 720p.
Works with both HTML5 and Flash versions.
Keeps the navigation link and comment links.
additional_info: Inspired by The escapist - Stonking wide view (minimal) but remade from scratch. I added support for the HTML5 version (for subscribers to the site), changed some of the padding, and removed more cruft. I also restored the comments link since I use that.
